trends: There have been 229 other sightings in Las Vegas
There were no other sightings in Las Vegas on or around September 30th 2000
Summary: brown object gliding with no lights
divs: Sighting Detailsi was in my car during my shift as a security officer next to the frontiercasino. while sitting inside my car facing south i saw an object flying over thetreasure island casino. it looked like a blimp but shorter and bulky. whatcalled my attention was it had no inscriptions and no lights like regular blimpsdo, and i was close to the maccarran airport. i think nobody is allowed to beflying at 3:20 in the morning whith no lights. this object was being illuminatedby the casinos lights. when it moved outside this lights it became invisible.the impression i got was that of a big animal fliyng, but it wasnt that forsure. thanks.
